subject: AM Brief: Thu, 28 Aug 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. USD strengthened amid concerns over Cape Verde Escudo.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 13:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Collins - Champlin upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Celo viridis dolores approbo coniecto solio sol talus.
- AFR: Coruscus villa centum volubilis claro absum.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Opportunity at Top-Tier Hedge Fund - Melbourne
body:
Hi Thomas,

Your profile stood out given your experience in metals & mining. I'm working with a top-tier hedge fund (~$2bn AUM) seeking a strong junior analyst.

Open to a confidential 10-minute call this week?

Best,
James Robertson

--
James Robertson
Senior Associate
Selby Jennings | Ph: (459) 972-9521 x2269

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Future Fund
body:
Tom,

Client instruction just came down. We need to liquidate the the energy sector holdings.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: Phishing Alert: Fake Compliance Training Email
body:
Security Alert.

Be aware of a phishing campaign using a fake 'Compliance Training' email. Do not click links from 'jpmorgan.compliance.training@gmail.com'. If clicked, contact IT Security immediately.

--
J.P. Morgan Technology - APAC
